Text:
[II] To our Redeemer, who desired to be baptized by John in the Jordan river, let us pray:
[IR] Lord, send your Spirit upon us.
[I1] Christ, servant of God, in whom the Father rejoices,
[I2] send your Spirit upon us.
[I1] Christ, chosen of God, you did not break the crushed reed, nor extinguish the flickering flame,
[I2] have mercy on all who seek you in truth.
[I1] Christ, Son of God, the light to the nations and chosen by the Father to establish the new covenant,
[I2] open the eyes of the blind in the waters of baptism.
[I1] Christ, Savior of all, the Father consecrated you by the Holy Spirit to be our Savior,
[I2] lead all to you, to see and believe, that all may have eternal life.
[I1] Christ, our hope, who guides us from darkness into the light of salvation,
[I2] receive our siblings who have died into your kingdom.
Changes: 2022-01-09 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of these intentions.
